other_tests.findings: Initial improvement in visual acuity in the right eye followed by worsening to 'count fingers' vision.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The visual acuity in the right eye ultimately worsened.

other_tests.findings: Added experimentally to photodynamic therapy regimen.
Visual acuity in the right eye was 20/400, left eye 20/30. Left fundus showed large soft drusen, mild pigmentary mottling, without subretinal fluid or hemorrhage.
Aborted due to intraorbital hemorrhage during anesthesia.
